lead_paragraph: Ron Wilson was introduced as the coach of the Toronto Maple Leafs, less than a month after he was fired by the San Jose Sharks. Wilson, 53, signed a four-year deal. He was fired May 12 by San Jose after the Sharks lost to the Dallas Stars in the second round of the playoffs. He succeeds Paul Maurice, who was fired last month after missing the playoffs in consecutive seasons.
